title: 【1.9】Glitch’s 3D材质包
author: Si1hOuetse丶
txt_content:
如果你在找一款简单的，但是希望它能够尽可能的接近原版的材质，并且还要有3D模块，那么试试这款Glitch’s 3D 附加包。简单，并且是原版的材质，将3D模块带到游戏中。






GlitcherDOTbe's 3D ADDONS PACK【此资源包适合Minecraft1.9X版本】



作者的话（英文，原版）如果看不懂可以跳过，连翻译都无法正确翻译出来的神文章233
THIS PACK IS FOR MINECRAFT 1.9 

Hey what is up everybody GlitcherDOTbe here and today I've got something to show you guys. 

Recently I've been making my own 3d models to add on to my Minecraft Lets Play Survival World. I've been trying to add subtle changes to it make my survival world feeling a little bit nicer. 

Keep in mind I am not trying to create a new texture pack, I am trying to stick as close as I can to default without changing the block or items purpose. I will be adding more along the way as I learn more about making 3d models. But if you want to learn more about making 3d models yourself you can watch a video I've made about it or if you want to join my Survival building exprerience you can watch that on the same channel aswell! 

NOTE TO YOUTUBERS : 
If you make a resourcepack showcase of this pack make sure to tweet it at me and I'll make sure to hype it up and to put it in this post aswell! <3 

图片时间
（图片全都来自于原文）












Si1hOuetse的废话如果你对此资源包感兴趣，请前往http://www.planetminecraft.com/t ... -3d-addons-pack-19/支持资源包作者哟！这是对资源包和作者最起码的尊敬！





下载地址（或见上）

点此传送到原文地址下载


下载方法：

1.打开http://www.planetminecraft.com/t ... -3d-addons-pack-19/ 原文链接
2.在右边会有一个黄色按钮上面写着Download Texture Pack字眼 按下去
3.选择下载路径，下载成功，放进Minecraft1.9X版本的resourcepack文件夹，进游戏体验



------THE END------
Thank you for your support
:)
